mapper.sql: td_id, sid_daily, sid, daily, scenic_name, numbers, free_times, discount_times, total_times
mapper.select:
select from m_trip_daily
scenic_name like #{name} '%'
and daily>=#{start}
and #{end}>=daily
order by td_id desc
select from m_trip_daily where sid_daily=#{sidDaily} limit 1

mapper.update:
update m_trip_daily
sid_daily = #{sidDaily,jdbcType=CHAR},
sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
daily = #{daily,jdbcType=DATE},
scenic_name = #{scenicName,jdbcType=CHAR},
numbers = #{numbers,jdbcType=BIGINT},
free_times = #{freeTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT},
discount_times = #{discountTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT},
total_times = #{totalTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where td_id = #{tdId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update m_trip_daily set sid_daily = #{sidDaily,jdbcType=CHAR}, sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, daily = #{daily,jdbcType=DATE}, scenic_name = #{scenicName,jdbcType=CHAR}, numbers = #{numbers,jdbcType=BIGINT}, free_times = #{freeTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, discount_times = #{discountTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, total_times = #{totalTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT} where td_id = #{tdId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into m_trip_daily (sid_daily, sid, daily, scenic_name, numbers, free_times, discount_times, total_times ) values
( #{po.sidDaily,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.daily,jdbcType=DATE}, #{po.scenicName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.numbers,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.freeTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.discountTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.totalTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT})
